response_format_requirements.requirement: Use proper JSON formatting with no syntax errors
Write descriptions in complete, natural sentences
Be specific about what you observe - describe the actual content
Note location and prominence of different content areas

response_format.json_output_schema: { "page_number": "Page number if visible, otherwise 'unknown'", "image_quality": "good | fair | poor", "content_description": "A complete description of what is on this page. Write in full sentences describing all the content you observe, where it's located, and any notable characteristics. Be specific and thorough.", "quality_notes": "Any issues affecting the image (blur, skew, artifacts) - null if none", "enhancement_recommended": "true | false - whether image enhancement would improve analysis", "enhancement_reason": "Reason for enhancement recommendation - null if enhancement_recommended is false" }
